0.0.2.name: wordpress/foundationpress
0.0.2.description:
FoundationPress offers the Foundation Framework styles with WordPress Shortcodes. The aim is to make adding elements such as Tabs, Grid, Buttons...) to your WordPress blog as simple as possible.

FoundaionPress support the following styles

Typography

  • H1 to H6

  • Keystrokes

  • Blockquote
  • Labels
  • Buttons
  • Panels

Tables

  • Table Container
  • Table Header and Body
  • Table Body and Cell

Grid

  • Grid Container
  • 12 Column divisions

Components

  • Tabs
  • Accordion (Collapsible Menus)
  • Tooltips
  • Alerts
